title: I Guess the Supreme Court Is Totally Cool with Racial Gerrymandering in Texas
description: Chief Justice John Roberts and the carefully manufactured conservative majority have dealt another deadly blow to voting rights.
content: At this point, the carefully manufactured conservative majority on the Supreme Court should just show up for work wearing aprons and change-makers, telling the rubes who come expecting justice to ste… [+2702 chars]
